channel.title: ARM64 Ubuntu installation error
channel.description:
Hello,
I installed leaf on an ARM64 Ubuntu 20.0 desktop, but when doing leaf profile setup for mangoh red I am getting the following error : Error during installation: Error during install step for wp76-image_5.0.0 (command returned 126)
I am trying to set up an environment on mac M1, not sure if this is caused due to incorrect Ubuntu version or because of architecture.
Any suggestions?
Thanks

item.title: ARM64 Ubuntu installation error
item.dc:creator: johnfoster
item.description:
acek:

Should I downgrade my Ubuntu? Is there a way to get it working on Ubuntu 20?

Yes there is a way. I will find sources with information and send it to you

Read full topic
